description: People are being urged not to leave appliances unattended, or to overload them.
title: Swansea: Fire safety warning issued after utility room blaze
title_page: Swansea: Fire safety warning issued after utility room blaze - BBC News
maintext:
A fire service is warning people not to turn appliances on while they are unattended after it was called to a blaze in Swansea.
Mid and West Wales Fire and Rescue Service attended the incident at a house in Gorseinon at 12:26 GMT on Thursday.
The fire, believed to have started accidentally, started in the property's utility room on the ground floor, causing "significant fire and smoke damage".
The service issued a reminder on white goods safety, urging people to "never leave appliances unattended".
